alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Peoria; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 11:11AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Marshall, Stark, and Peoria Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1111 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Atkinson to near Victoria to near Avon. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... La Fayette around 1120 AM CDT. Toulon around 1125 AM CDT. Elmira around 1130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Osceola, Castleton, Elmwood, Bradford, Brimfield, Laura, Elmore, Princeville, Wyoming, Dunlap, Chillicothe and Camp Grove. This includes the following highways... Interstate 474 between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 74 between mile markers 69 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
